channel.title: nokogiri on The mind of Esteban

item.title: Nokogiri on El Capitan
item.description: Finally El Capitan arrived and I couldn’t be more eager to install it on my machine; as soon as I read on Twitter that it was available I jump to the AppStore and started the download process which seemed like a bad idea at the time:
